Just buried my wife today. This became 'our' song in 2015. A couple of years later, we were at a bike rally and there was a karaoke contest...... I sang this for her, and everywhere the lyric is "winning" I said it like Charlie Sheen, but the rest sang totally straight with the full love behind it. They gave me 1st place trophy! Just one of the beautiful memories of us and this song entertwined. Thank you John so much, for sharing this part of your soul with us.

Celebrated my birthday with this song. April 19, 2023. Still celebrating it even now with this wonderful song.  Such an iconic song, and a song from my childhood when times were good. So many nostalgic childhood memories, even in my teen years, and now even as a adult. Now I'm 21. I even still remember the day this song came out. Can't believe time passes by so fast. If only time would slow down. Like what a time it was when this song would be played everywhere, especially during the summer whenever I would return back home.  Even heard it on the radio yesterday on the 20th of April, when I was with my dad and my twin brother when we went out on a car ride to continue our birthday celebration.
